```{r}
dat_forest <- ftibble("./order_material/result/step2_coxph/gene.csv")
dat_forest

require(forestplot)
test <- forestplot::forestplot(
  dat_forest, labeltext = c(geneName, p.value), 
  mean = HR, lower = lower, upper = upper
)
fp_add_header(
  test, HR = "HR" |> fp_txt_plain() |> fp_align_center(),
                     geneName = "Measurements"
)
```
